m_descr:
This module will automatically turn off selected devices (switch, dimmer, motor control) after no movement has been detected for a defined time.
Check https://github.com/maros/Zway-AutoOffInactive/blob/master/README.md for detailed documentation.
sensors_helper: Multiple binary sensors (ideally movement sensors) that measure presence
switch_helper: Multiple switches that should be turned off after given inactivity
